name: handled
description: Handled 3PL Platform - Internal tools and data management

scripts.db:migrate:status: psql -U handled_user -d handled -c 'SELECT version, description, applied_at, execution_time_ms FROM config.schema_migrations ORDER BY version;'
scripts.db:migrate:status:primary: psql "$PRIMARY_DATABASE_URL" -c 'SELECT version, description, applied_at, execution_time_ms FROM config.schema_migrations ORDER BY version;'
scripts.db:migrate:status:data: psql "$DATA_DATABASE_URL" -c 'SELECT version, description, applied_at, execution_time_ms FROM config.schema_migrations ORDER BY version;'
